name: Kitsune Go!
description: After a long time of peace our temples have fallen into distress. Evil masks have appeared from the mist, and they have stolen the precious chakra treasured for generations. As the leader of the spirits you, the swiftest and most valiant kitsune, are the one to recover all the thieved sacred energy through this amazing maze-style eat'em all arcade. May the god of wind be with you!
